title: The Young Montrose
description: [Librarian Note: this is an alternate cover for ISBN: 0340162139]From back cover:'One man alone could not change the course of history. But James Graham was determined to try. A gallant soldier, talented leader and compelling personality, his fame has echoed down the centuries. For the young Marquis of Montrose was to give his utmost in the service of his beloved country.'
author: Nigel Tranter
